name: The Mechanical Heart
description:
A small adventure game set in a dreamlike sequence, where the only catch is to escape. Explore the place and find the exit.

Made with Unity, 3D models made with SketchUp

Sounds: https://www.freesound.org/

Version 1.0

WASD / Left joystick to move

Mouse / Right joystick to look around

LMB / A to interact

Esc to quit the game
